choose-country.title: Choose your country
choose-country.subtitle: Please choose the country you are in right now or the country for which you wish to view resources.

distress-meter.title: What's your current level of distress?
distress-meter.scale: {{min}} means no distress, {{max}} is the worst
distress-meter.subtitle: Tap on the up and down arrows to indicate how you are feeling.

high-distress.text: This is a very high level of distress. It would be good to get help as soon as possible. Would you like to talk to someone now?

actions.help: No, continue to the support tool
actions.talk: Yes, I want to talk to someone

relationships.helper: Try these strategies - either on your own or, better, with your partner!
